name: AGM-65H Maverick
description:
The AGM-65 Maverick is an air-to-ground missile designed for close air support. 

It is the most widely produced precision-guided missile in the Western world, and is effective against a wide range of tactical targets, including armor, air defenses, ships, ground transportation and fuel storage facilities.

The H model is an AGM-65B/D missile upgraded with a new charge-coupled device (CCD) seeker better suited for the desert environment.
